title: General Rules
items: stretz is a beast
All players must follow Discord ToS and FiveM guidelines.
English is the primary language. Use English in /ooc and main chat.
Respect all staff members. Their decisions are final.
Exploiting, hacking, or using unauthorized mods will result in a permanent ban.
Do not advertise other servers or communities.
Keep OOC (Out of Character) drama out of the server.

title: Roleplay Rules
items: Stay in character at all times. Breaking character ruins immersion.
No RDM (Random Deathmatch) – you must have a valid RP reason to initiate combat.
No VDM (Vehicle Deathmatch) – do not use vehicles as weapons without RP justification.
No Powergaming – do not force actions on other players.
No Metagaming – do not use OOC information in character.
No Fear RP – if someone has a gun to your head, act accordingly.
New Life Rule (NLR) – when you respawn after death, you do not remember what happened.

title: Voice & Chat
items: Voice chat must be used for in-character conversations when possible.
No screaming, music, or disruptive noises in voice.
Use /ooc for out-of-character questions. Keep it brief.
No spamming in any chat channel.
Use /me for actions and /do for environmental descriptions.

title: Character Rules
items: One character per person unless whitelisted for multiple.
No famous characters or unrealistic backstories.
Character names must be realistic (first and last name).
Do not share characters or accounts with other players.

title: Combat Rules
items: Value your life (VYL) – do not run into gunfights without fear.
No combat logging – leaving during active RP/combat is prohibited.
You must initiate RP before any hostile action (e.g., robbery, kidnapping).
Do not revive yourself or others without proper RP (e.g., EMS).
3-minute rule – wait 3 minutes before returning to a crime scene after death.

title: Vehicle Rules
items: Drive realistically. No excessive speeding in populated areas.
No vehicle spawning in front of others without RP reason.
Carjacking requires RP initiation (threat, robbery scenario).
Obey traffic laws in non-chase situations.

title: Punishments
items: Minor infractions: Warning → Kick
Moderate infractions: Temporary ban (1–7 days)
Major infractions: Permanent ban
RDM, VDM, hacking, exploiting: Permanent ban
Staff reserve the right to adjust punishments based on context.
